Description: Hollow gold bangle made of thin sheet gold beaten into shape on a wooden ring. The two ends were joined to form a three-sided hoop with an open internal face, onto which was soldered a thin sheet gold strip. No further decoration or inscription has been added.
Curator's comments: With a miniature granite torso (1966,0418.1), gold 'awaw'-bangle (1872,0604.1098) and a miniature gold 'shebyu'-collar (1872,0604.690).
